messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a dying character fails a Pushed Medicine roll?
The patient dies.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be a result of an investigator failing a Pushed roll?
Disturbing results, possibly involving amputation or blood poisoning.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the original definition of Natural World?
The study of plant and animal life in its environment.
You are a helpful assistant.
How has the study of Natural World evolved over time?
It has long separated into a range of academic disciplines by the nineteenth century.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a character fails a Pushed Medicine roll when dying?
The patient dies.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the original scope of the Natural World skill?
The study of plant and animal life in its environment.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the main difference between Natural World and other skills like Biology and Botany?
Natural World represents traditional, unscientific knowledge and personal observation.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can Natural World be used for, besides a scientific understanding of the natural world?
Identifying species, habits, and habitats in a general way, and making educated guesses.
You are a helpful assistant.
What was the traditional study of by the nineteenth century?
a range of academic disciplines (Biology, Botany, etc.)
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Natural World, a skill?
the traditional (unscientific) knowledge and personal observation of farmers, fishermen, inspired amateurs, and hobbyists
You are a helpful assistant.
What skill is necessary for a scientific understanding of the natural world?
Biology, Botany and Zoology skills
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the opposing skill/Difficulty level of Natural World?
Biology, Botany and Zoology skills
You are a helpful assistant.
What is one of the skills to identify species, habits, and habitats in a general way?
identifying species, habits, and habitats in a general way
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Natural World used for?
judgment, appreciation, folk tradition, and enthusiasm
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the difficulty level for identifying a rare species of plant or animal?
hard difficulty
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the difficulty level for remembering some common lore?
regular difficulty
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of a pushed roll?
Examining the habitat, tasting the unknown mushroom or plant
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an insane investigator fails a pushed roll?
They go native and will be lost in the wilderness until friends come to their aid.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a possible consequence of getting the facts wrong?
They get the facts wrong, and instead of the wasps being repelled by your concoction of swamp mud and herbs, they are drawn to you
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigator picks the wrong mushroom?
They pick the wrong mushroom and find themselves, hours later, walking naked towards a policeman.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the primary purpose of the Navigate skill?
Navigate allows the user to find their way in storms or clear weather, in day or at night.
You are a helpful assistant.
How can the difficulty of a Navigate roll be affected?
The difficulty of a Navigate roll can be affected by the character's familiarity with the area, with a bonus die granted if they are familiar with the area.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the regular difficulty level for a Navigate roll?
Regular difficulty for a Navigate roll is to keep on the right route, use the sun and stars to identify compass positions, and map a small area of terrain.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the hard difficulty level for a Navigate roll?
Hard difficulty for a Navigate roll is to head in the right direction when there is no clear route.
